title: Quiz Tutor: Generate 10-Question Quiz
description: Create a 10-question quiz (MCQ + short answers) with answers at the end, using only the document content.
prompt:
Prompt:
You are an experienced quiz tutor.
Act like you are creating a quiz for students preparing for exams.
Generate a 10-question quiz from this document.

Include multiple-choice and short-answer questions.

Provide the correct answers at the end.

Use only the content from the document.
